website_summaries.verdict: Rugged gaiters that are best for cold, intense outdoor activity.
pros: Keeps snow and debris from entering the shoe and protects the pants from getting wet
Provides an extra layer of warmth and is virtually indestructible
cons: Customers say the underfoot strap can come loose

customer_reviews.title: Great material, design and fit
customer_reviews.text: I wore these today on a 5 mile snow hike here in North Dakota and love them. First a comment about the fit. I'm 5'11" 215# size 10.5 US shoe size and they couldn't be more perfect. The materials used are very good, the buckles and sole strap are very nice and they stayed on my calf the entire walk even though I had them over nylon pants. A superb product I would highly recommend.I actually felt a sense of warmth and walking comfort with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: The design and overall material used was fairly decent. ...
customer_reviews.text: The design and overall material used was fairly decent. However, after only 1 month of wearing these the metal clasp at the base of the gator which holds the lower strap in place snapped in half. Im not sure what quality the metal clasps are, as the rest of the material used seems to be of decent quality, Considering I buckled the lower strap once, and slip my boots on and off to avoid breaking down the Velcro and buckles I expected something of this quality to last much much longer during my long alaskan winters. Wont be buying these again, I suggest you dont either.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are well made I like them. For more money I could have gotten an even better pair. But why, I looked at many at sporting good stores and these are comparable, maybe not quit as HD as some. I expect these to last many years based on six or so uses a year. For size comparison, I am 5.10, weigh 160 lbs and wear a size 11 Danner boot. they fit everything great except they are a little loose around my calf and they really have no way to adjust that. I have considered adding a strap or something for that. However I use them and the stay up. Just not quite tight enough. Mine are the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming guy

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I work in deep snow every day during the winter and these have saved my pants from being soaked. Snow doesn't get up into the bottom when stepping down and no snow is allowed in over the top if I'm in really deep snow. I haven't owned them super long but would recommend them highly. The valcro is wide enough, and covered well that it has no problem staying together. Also the under the foot strap being made of tpu does not get snow built up and stuck to it like some fabric straps do.
customer_reviews.author: creech_04

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, recommended.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! A bit more expensive than I would usually like to pay for an item like this, but in the long run well worth it. These are very durable and stay put like they should. I use them mainly for winter hiking to keep my legs dry, and they even add a bit of warmth to your calves. They even look pretty good when I am wearing them. The waterproofing works well, and I stay dry and warm hiking in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: 4TheLoveOfHiking

customer_reviews.title: Do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I follow fox hunts on foot, walking, running, through wet grass, mud, creeks. I got these because I got tired of wet, muddy pants. I like them. After a day's hunting in Bean rubber hunting boots, I toss these in the wash. They come out fine. There's some sort of plastic or varnish on the inside that is peeling away from the washing. Maybe it's waterproofing. Most people won't be washing these as often as I do. They are still working well. Good, sturdy Velcro on the front. The straps under the insteps are a plasticized fabric that seems to be holding up well and doesn't get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pen

customer_reviews.title: Good gaiters for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind these are not Gore-tex gaiters, so you will build up some moisture underneath them, especially if you are wearing rain pants or soft shell pants. They do a great job of keeping snow out of your boots or hiking shoes; they protect your footwear and pants from thick brush; but unlike the more expensive Gore-tex gaiters, you will build up moisture inside. Well worth the price, they have held up well. Only giving 4 stars due to moisture retention inside the gaiters.
customer_reviews.author: ErickO

customer_reviews.title: but I would probably recommend just purchasing a pair of WP pants
customer_reviews.text: Gaiters work well, but I would probably recommend just purchasing a pair of WP pants. Shoes are still exposed and if they are not Water-Proof, then feet will get wet. Wet feet when hunting all day = not good :( Recommended for keeping mud and light snow off lower part of pant legs.
customer_reviews.author: benneth01

customer_reviews.title: Work great for motorcycles........
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for those in-between rain / motorcycle days, when it isn`t raining but has been all night/roads are soaked. Keeps all that "spray" off your lower legs, keeps the old Levi`s dry. I wear them with waterproof boots. Perfect. Easy on-off/velcro (15 seconds to put on or take off!), easy to stow away, space savers. Much better than dealing with the old rain suit/pants on a day when that road "spray" is your only enemy. Worth the price...........
customer_reviews.author: Scott-Mo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price however not the most technical.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. They get the job done and are mostly waterproof. They really don't breath well like a Gore-Tex type fabric would but for the price point that is to be expected. They are however very durable, fear-not to wear your sharp crampons or snowshoes. The occasional mis-step won't tear this fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: A great choice
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a week of hunting in the mountains. I used these three of the days in wet weather. They worked great and stayed in place. The strap that wraps under the boot and buckles on the side seems durable and held up well to the abuse of 8 miles of daily rocky hiking. I'm 6'1" 215# and wear a size 11 boot. The fit was perfect. Reasonable price for the product. There are many options on Amazon for these but I feel this was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Not good sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for myself, but were to small to fit me. Now they are my wife's. good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: frankly99150

customer_reviews.title: I like it - used it on many alpine scrambles in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it - used it on many alpine scrambles in the snow. The only problem is that the strap that goes around the shoe comes off whenever u posthole in snow, and this is a big pain. There is no way to lock the strap in place, and I find that a odd design. Though, I fixed the problem using a ziptie, and this has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Al Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps socks and pants dry
customer_reviews.text: Fits snugly over my large hiking boots and also cross-country skiing shoes. I recently wore them while x-skiing up at the mountain and they helped keep my base layer and old style (probably not waterproof anymore) shoes dry. The only downside is the clasps at the upper calf don't hold as tightly as I would like, my old pair had velcro and I would prefer that.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I bought these instead of OR Crocs due to cost
customer_reviews.text: A great lower cost option instead of Outdoor Research Crocs! Haven't tried to total waterproofness of them, but they are well built and stay up well. The VERY TOUGH instep straps are fairly bombproof from what I have walked on. Con: Getting the straps to stay put and not slip took me a bit to figure out. Once I did they work great!
customer_reviews.author: keep_climbing

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is a tall guy and ordered his standard size: Large. We started hiking and within 1 mile these gaiters were slipping, become unhooked, letting snow in... you get the idea! Despite constant adjustments, these gaiters were just too big. Check your size carefully. Customer service was poor. For reference, my fiance is 6' and 190 lb.
customer_reviews.author: SNLeslie

customer_reviews.title: Great in the snow
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for two days in the snow on a recent hunt and they worked almost flawlessly. On the second day, one of the buckles worked its way loose, but the gaiters stayed in place anyway and I didn't even discover the loose buckle until I took them off.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Croft

customer_reviews.title: Great performance and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, buying my second pair! I've used these up in the white mountains in New Hampshire all winter last year and they held up! Great at keeping the snow and mud out of your boots and really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Trombone Maste4r

customer_reviews.title: Plastic strap broke on the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to climb Mt Elbert in the Rockies. That only lasted about 5 hrs before the cheap plastic strap that goes underneath your boot broke. Spend a little extra and get something better
customer_reviews.author: matthew f.

customer_reviews.title: Not Baaaad...
customer_reviews.text: If they would have been easier to put on I would have given them 5 stars. I had another pair that did not need to attach with another strap under the boot or shoe. You could not get away without using the bottom strap with this pair. Having said that they are much much better made, & the materials seem very high quality. They also look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: TimG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the product and timely fashion it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Looks like I'll have to wait till next year to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these rafter big snow, LOL, and I have no snow. Looks like I'll have to wait till next year to use them. They came superquick great quality, would recommend him to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Dula

customer_reviews.title: These are a great buy. The arch strap loop buckle broke on ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy. The arch strap loop buckle broke on one from wear from scrambling through snow covered rocks, which would be hard on any buckle. No biggie, I sewed the strap into position after removing both buckles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted !!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for . In my case I just wanted something to cover the bottom of my pants while I am weed whacking the grass at home and especially at work.Tired of wet/green jeans ! These should do just fine . Plus I can wear them walking in the woods fishing what ever . No limits !! THANKS MATT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem to work as well as many I have ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work as well as many I have owned over the years. I wonder how the straps will last over the coming year, but not worried about it now.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Water proof gaiters
customer_reviews.text: Quick and very easy to install. I use them over my work shoes mostly to keep my pant cuffs dry when I am washing down equipment as they are so easy to use. They keep my pant cuffs below the knee and my leather work shoes completely dry and wash off very easily. A must I keep behind the rear seat of my tanker truck.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: The upper (leg) portion is good, very durable
customer_reviews.text: Fair price, I am neutral over all on the product though. The upper (leg) portion is good, very durable. The lower (strap) portion appears weak though. After the first use there was obvious wear on the strap
customer_reviews.author: A M.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: took it on a 4 day hiking and camping trip into the back country of yellowstone and it held up great kept ticks and other bugs from getting up my pants and sharp pointy plants from sticking threw and it also held up to rocky and steep terrain climbing so i got to say this is a must for any hiker
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these are good but they did not fit over my snow boots
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go hiking in Cascades and today they worked great. I did a 9 mile round trip hike entirely through snow from ankle to waist deep today and they were amazing. My feet and pants stayed dry. They were breathable and keep my legs a little warmer because it was below 30degF the whole day. I'm overall extremely satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: kote

customer_reviews.title: I recently used these on a winter hike and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently used these on a winter hike and they kept my pants dry and protected from thistles and burs!
customer_reviews.author: Clay Graham

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and durable. Kept my lowers dry and warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding and durable. Kept my lowers dry and warm. I was worried about the plastic strap under the foot but I have put a lot of miles on mine and no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: These are decent gators for a good price. They do make a little noise when ...
customer_reviews.text: These are decent gators for a good price. They do make a little noise when rubbing together but nothing more that most pant legs.
customer_reviews.author: Pintlar Tactical

customer_reviews.title: These gaiters do an excellent job of keeping 30 degree air off my ankles ...
customer_reviews.text: These gaiters do an excellent job of keeping 30 degree air off my ankles at 60mph on my motorcycle. I can't recommend them enough. If you ride in the cold, you can't go wrong with a pair of these Black Crystal gaiters.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Not just for snow but any climate without getting you wet.
customer_reviews.text: Nice for moderate to moderate/rough terrain without tearing. Kept me dry and warm and I had no problem with them falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: too small around base of foot with heavy boots on - not workable
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I looked at some that were about twice the money but didn't see much difference in quality. I consider these a tremendous value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these elk hunting in Colorado on a very wet week. They held up very well in some tough conditions. Quiet when going through tall grasses and kept my pants and socks bone dry. Just make sure the toes of your boots are just as waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: p@tbd

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my cross-country
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on and just what I wanted . It did keep the snow out of my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These lasted me a month of constant hiking, and ...
customer_reviews.text: These lasted me a month of constant hiking , and at the end of those 30 days , the bottom straps were deteriorated.
customer_reviews.author: Lonely Mountain FIlms

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these gaiters for my husband and he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gaiters for my husband and he loves them. He's put them through the ringer the past year and they've held up amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dotterweich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them and they are great for climbing fourteeners in the snow!
customer_reviews.author: Meg Braun

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well, provided some warmth
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well, kept snow from going to the top of the boot. Instead of wearing insulated bib overall, I wore these with double longjohns and cut down on alittle weight. Because I kneel down sometimes on the ground, I would consider buying a pair that go up over the knee, next time though
customer_reviews.author: ronald draper

customer_reviews.title: Material is alright, buckles annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The buckles are a bit much. I feel them sticking out as I walk. The rest of the gaiter looks and feels high quality though. Maybe it's just me.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Husband, Happy Wife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and kept the snow out of the boots
customer_reviews.author: PAtrick

customer_reviews.title: great gaiters
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gaiters to use with my low top hiking shoes for a trip through Olympic National. They worked great as we ran into snow that i sank into a couple times. No snow got in at all. Great product. Cannot imagine a more expensive product being any better. Very durable and light weight. Also great for hiking through thick brush and flooded trails. Product was delivered well before the expected date.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: These gaiters work very great. I used them hunting in the mountains during daily rainstorms. They protect well and keep you dry. The only downfall is they don't breathe very well.
customer_reviews.author: mtnman

customer_reviews.title: Such a great feel and even holds in a little heat too
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on my winter hike and all I can say is Woosah!!! Such a great feel and even holds in a little heat too. Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good gaitors for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep my shoes dry when shoveling snow. They do a great job and fit like a glove. Like others have mentioned the bottom strap is cheap looking but still works fine. Maybe not the best for backcountry excursions but suits my needs just fine. And for $25 I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: gregory a ryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. He has had no complaints, but we have very little snow this year.
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: Tough gaiters are adequate
customer_reviews.text: The gaiters are well made but more suited to hiking than cross country skiing. Mainly because they are stiff material and have larger buckles on boot strap than typical skiing gaiters. One nice feature is they are easy to put on with the Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: David stearns

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product but the only compkaint would be the strap that goes under your boot .. it only took me three days to break them but I fixed by having my mother sew a leather strap in its place
customer_reviews.author: Dustinn Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Black Crystal Hiking Gaiters
customer_reviews.text: Selected these for my husband who delivers propane in northern WI. They keep the snow out and your pants and socks dry. The service was good and prompt. The gaiters arrived ahead of schedule. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kaholmstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great product.Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gaiters for new year ski vacation. They worked great. It's well made, high quality, light weight and durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gene F

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the performance of these gaitors. Hooked in and never came off. The top strap is just tight enough to keep the gaitor in place. I would recommend and buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Thenumbersneverlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing, my husband loved them. No more wet pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Very light-weight and durable. Bought for my husband and he really liked them. True to size and a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: They work great! Why I haven't bought a pair before now ...
customer_reviews.text: They work great! Why I haven't bought a pair before now I don't know but you should get a pair. I use mine often and they are made well.
customer_reviews.author: RW Jones

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The arch straps on these gaiters slip in the buckles (poor design). I lost a buckle the first time I wore them. I requested a refund and will report on whether the seller, David Tan, honored my request.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used them as of this review, they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them as of this review, they fit well and seem to be well constructed. I believe they will do what I bought them for, keeping snow out of boots on this winters elk hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Walter G. Coble

customer_reviews.title: good overall
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good product for the $. The straps around the bottom look a bit flimsy, but we'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Knotts7

customer_reviews.title: Gaitors
customer_reviews.text: well we sent back......style not what we hoped for..they were too big and you couldn't adjust them.....did not like them
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: the gaiters are fine, I just hate the conspicuous white label in ...
customer_reviews.text: the gaiters are fine, I just hate the conspicuous white label in front. I feel like a walking advertisement for the company. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the Black Crystal Hiking Ski Snow Gaiters Waterproof ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Black Crystal Hiking Ski Snow Gaiters Waterproof Breathable Nylon Men's Black Size Large, and today I receive the WRONG ITEM that is a Froggtoggs Waterproof Outerwear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for 3 seasons of elk hunting. The early season elk hunt is characterized by slush, mud, sleet, rain and snow. These things are tuff as heck. The velcro, despite seeming to be inferior, is in face tough too. I have never had them come undone. I typically walk 7 to 10 miles per day, through rugged terrain, snow up to my knees, ending in a muddy trail back to the truck. These things have never failed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Baca

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall, especially at the price point!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second winter wearing these and have used them approximately 6 times and have no complaints whatsoever. I have a couple design improvements that I could make but functionality and durability are 4-5 Stars all day long. This is especially true when you compare these to other products costing much more for a similarly designed product. Takes about 2 minutes to secure put these on and stay in position. Hiked about 5 miles in them yesterday and have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Heading into my second season wearing these in the mountains of new Hampshire. They are a little saggy compared to new but otherwise in very good condition. The material is tough enough and keeps the wind and snow off my legs. Will buy again when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not Heavy Duty Enough For Work
customer_reviews.text: These are all Velcro closure, no zipper. They have a buckle retaining system at the top that you have to undo and redo every time you put them on, so for a person on the go it's way to tedious. The material is single layer no lining, like a cheap rain coat. I would not recommend these for a person who uses for work way to light weight. They are also very short and i got the largest size. I can't believe the price of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: They keep my legs dry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these gaiters to work in rain. I give them 5 star rating since they save my pants and shoes from getting dirty. Easy to fit and Velcro zips fasten excellently.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting gaiters
customer_reviews.text: These fit well (I am USA size 11 shoe). It appears that these would fit a wide range of boot sizes. Little snow gets back up under the gaiter. Bottom plastic strap seems like it might wear through if used much on rocks and ice, but this is yet to be tested.
customer_reviews.author: Expo Reviews

product_meta.title: Black Crystal Hiking Ski Snow Gaiters Waterproof Breathable Nylon Men's Black Size Large
product_meta.description: These gaiters are good for hiking, walking, backpacking, cross-country skiing. They are made of durable waterproof materials to sustain harsh weather. Pair these gaiters with hiking boots or ski boots to keep rocks, dirt and snow from getting into your footwear. These gaiters fit most US shoe size 10.5-12 (European size 44-46). Use the following measurements as guide when choose size. Detailed measurements: * Front length: 15.4 inch (40 cm) * Top opening circumference: 18 inch (46 cm) * Calf circumference: 17.7 inch (45 cm) * Ankle circumference: 16 inch (41 cm) * Bottom opening circumference: 19 inch (48 cm) Weight: 7-8 oz per pair. Check our other listings for small, medium and extra large size.
feature_bullets: Upper portion 70D 3-layer waterproof breathable nylon fabric. Lower portion 1000D 3000mm CORDURA ultra-durable waterproof nylon fabric
15mm DURAFLEX aluminum buckles, smooth to pull
Metal hook at the bottom to fasten to shoe lace
Dual locks for front closure, use strap at top and Velcro zipper
Instep straps use roller buckles to fasten, professional grade TPU for enhanced durability

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
